articles.title: Former AOA member Kwon Mina attempted suicide, now unconscious: Reports - AsiaOne
articles.description: South Korean media reported earlier this afternoon (July 29) that K-pop singer Kwon Mina has attempted suicide. A friend was unable to contact Mina on the phone and went to her home to check on her this morning. The 27-year-old was taken to the hospital, wher…

articles.author: Weizhen Tan
articles.title: Ratings agencies downgrade China Evergrande as concerns over junk bonds rise - CNBC
articles.description: China's tech crackdown may have triggered shockwaves across stock markets, but it's real estate that's sparking concerns in Asia's credit markets, BlackRock said.
articles.content:
Major credit ratings agencies this week downgraded China's most indebted property developer Evergrande, as concerns over Asia's junk bond sector rise.

articles.title: I worked only for my son, now I don't know who to work for: Mum of teen killed at Bedok basketball court - AsiaOne
articles.description: "I worked only for my son, now I don't know who to work for." Rahimah Lee Abdullah uttered those exact words as her eyes filled with tears. On Monday (July 26) night, Rahimah's son, Mohd Ridwan, left home for a game of basketball in Bedok and never came back.…
